A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie felt poorly put together. Comedy felt awkward\, and was not in line with the gravity of the situation. But it was hard to have any connection or feeling for any of the main characters\, let alone side ones\, so I guess the writers didn't think the story was critical either. \n\nBasically it was Empire Strikes back with shallow characters and huge plot holes. Oh and Jar Jar Binks type comedy thrown in for Disney to sell plush toys.
